name: abs
description: Compute the absolute value.

name: acos
description: Compute the inverse cosine of a value in radians.

name: acosh
description: Calculate the hyperbolic arccos of a value, defined as `acosh(x) = ln(sqrt(x^2 - 1) + x)`.

name: acot
description: Calculate the inverse cotangent of a value.

name: acoth
description: Calculate the hyperbolic arccotangent of a value, defined as `acoth(x) = (ln((x+1)/x) + ln(x/(x-1))) / 2`.

name: acsc
description: Calculate the inverse cotangent of a value.

name: acsch
description: Calculate the hyperbolic arccosecant of a value, defined as `acsch(x) = ln(1/x + sqrt(1/x^2 + 1))`.

name: add
description: Add two values.

name: and
description: Logical and. Test whether two values are both defined with a nonzero/nonempty value.

name: arg
description: Compute the argument of a complex value. If x = a+bi, the argument is computed as atan2(b, a).

name: asec
description: Calculate the inverse secant of a value.

name: asech
description: Calculate the inverse secant of a value.

name: asin
description: Compute the inverse sine of a value in radians.

name: asinh
description: Calculate the hyperbolic arcsine of a value, defined as `asinh(x) = ln(x + sqrt(x^2 + 1))`.

name: atan
description: Compute the inverse tangent of a value in radians.

name: atan2
description: Computes the principal value of the arc tangent of y/x in radians.

name: atanh
description: Calculate the hyperbolic arctangent of a value, defined as `atanh(x) = ln((1 + x)/(1 - x)) / 2`.

name: bellNumbers
description: The Bell Numbers count the number of partitions of a set. A partition is a pairwise disjoint subset of S whose union is S. `bellNumbers` only takes integer arguments. The following condition must be enforced: n >= 0.

name: bignumber
description: Create a big number from a number or string.

name: bin
description: Format a number as binary

name: bitAnd
description: Bitwise AND operation. Performs the logical AND operation on each pair of the corresponding bits of the two given values by multiplying them. If both bits in the compared position are 1, the bit in the resulting binary representation is 1, otherwise, the result is 0

name: bitNot
description: Bitwise NOT operation. Performs a logical negation on each bit of the given value. Bits that are 0 become 1, and those that are 1 become 0.

name: bitOr
description: Bitwise OR operation. Performs the logical inclusive OR operation on each pair of corresponding bits of the two given values. The result in each position is 1 if the first bit is 1 or the second bit is 1 or both bits are 1, otherwise, the result is 0.

name: bitXor
description: Bitwise XOR operation, exclusive OR. Performs the logical exclusive OR operation on each pair of corresponding bits of the two given values. The result in each position is 1 if only the first bit is 1 or only the second bit is 1, but will be 0 if both are 0 or both are 1.

name: boolean
description: Convert a string or number into a boolean.

name: catalan
description: The Catalan Numbers enumerate combinatorial structures of many different types. catalan only takes integer arguments. The following condition must be enforced: n >= 0.

name: cbrt
description: Compute the cubic root value. If x = y * y * y, then y is the cubic root of x. When `x` is a number or complex number, an optional second argument `allRoots` can be provided to return all three cubic roots. If not provided, the principal root is returned

name: ceil
description: Round a value towards plus infinity. If x is complex, both real and imaginary part are rounded towards plus infinity.

name: clone
description: Clone a variable. Creates a copy of primitive variables,and a deep copy of matrices

name: column
description: Return a column from a matrix or array.

name: combinations
description: Compute the number of combinations of n items taken k at a time

name: combinationsWithRep
description: Compute the number of combinations of n items taken k at a time with replacements.

name: compare
description: Compare two values. Returns 1 when x > y, -1 when x < y, and 0 when x == y.

name: compareNatural
description: Compare two values of any type in a deterministic, natural way. Returns 1 when x > y, -1 when x < y, and 0 when x == y.

name: compareText
description: Compare two strings lexically. Comparison is case sensitive. Returns 1 when x > y, -1 when x < y, and 0 when x == y.

name: complex
description: Create a complex number.

name: composition
description: The composition counts of n into k parts. composition only takes integer arguments. The following condition must be enforced: k <= n.

name: concat
description: Concatenate matrices. By default, the matrices are concatenated by the last dimension. The dimension on which to concatenate can be provided as last argument.

name: conj
description: Compute the complex conjugate of a complex value. If x = a+bi, the complex conjugate is a-bi.

name: cos
description: Compute the cosine of x in radians.

name: cosh
description: Compute the hyperbolic cosine of x in radians.

name: cot
description: Compute the cotangent of x in radians. Defined as 1/tan(x)

name: coth
description: Compute the hyperbolic cotangent of x in radians.

name: count
description: Count the number of elements of a matrix, array or string.

name: createUnit
description: Create a user-defined unit and register it with the Unit type.

name: cross
description: Calculate the cross product for two vectors in three dimensional space.

name: csc
description: Compute the cosecant of x in radians. Defined as 1/sin(x)

name: csch
description: Compute the hyperbolic cosecant of x in radians. Defined as 1/sinh(x)

name: ctranspose
description: Complex Conjugate and Transpose a matrix

name: cube
description: Compute the cube of a value. The cube of x is x * x * x.

name: cumsum
description: Compute the cumulative sum of all values.

name: deepEqual
description: Check equality of two matrices element wise. Returns true if the size of both matrices is equal and when and each of the elements are equal.

name: det
description: Calculate the determinant of a matrix

name: diag
description: Create a diagonal matrix or retrieve the diagonal of a matrix. When x is a vector, a matrix with the vector values on the diagonal will be returned. When x is a matrix, a vector with the diagonal values of the matrix is returned. When k is provided, the k-th diagonal will be filled in or retrieved, if k is positive, the values are placed on the super diagonal. When k is negative, the values are placed on the sub diagonal.

name: diff
description: Create a new matrix or array with the difference of the passed matrix or array.
Dim parameter is optional and used to indicant the dimension of the array/matrix to apply the difference
If no dimension parameter is passed it is assumed as dimension 0
Dimension is zero-based in javascript and one-based in the parser
Arrays must be 'rectangular' meaning arrays like [1, 2]
If something is passed as a matrix it will be returned as a matrix but other than that all matrices are converted to arrays

name: distance
description: Calculates the Euclidean distance between two points.

name: divide
description: Divide two values.

name: dot
description: Calculate the dot product of two vectors. The dot product of A = [a1, a2, a3, ..., an] and B = [b1, b2, b3, ..., bn] is defined as dot(A, B) = a1 * b1 + a2 * b2 + a3 * b3 + ... + an * bn

name: dotDivide
description: Divide two values element wise.

name: dotMultiply
description: Multiply two values element wise.

name: dotPow
description: Calculates the power of x to y element wise.

name: eigs
description: Calculate the eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a real symmetric matrix

name: equal
description: Check equality of two values. Returns true if the values are equal, and false if not.

name: equalText
description: Check equality of two strings. Comparison is case sensitive. Returns true if the values are equal, and false if not.

name: erf
description: Compute the erf function of a value using a rational Chebyshev approximations for different intervals of x

name: exp
description: Calculate the exponent of a value.

name: expm
description: Compute the matrix exponential, expm(A) = e^A. The matrix must be square. Not to be confused with exp(a), which performs element-wise exponentiation.

name: expm1
description: Calculate the value of subtracting 1 from the exponential value.

name: factorial
description: Compute the factorial of a value

name: fft
description: Calculate N-dimensional fourier transform

name: filter
description: Filter items in a matrix.

name: fix
description: Round a value towards zero. If x is complex, both real and imaginary part are rounded towards zero.

name: flatten
description: Flatten a multi dimensional matrix into a single dimensional matrix.

name: floor
description: Round a value towards minus infinity.If x is complex, both real and imaginary part are rounded towards minus infinity.

name: forEach
description: Iterates over all elements of a matrix/array, and executes the given callback function.

name: format
description: Format a value of any type as string.

name: fraction
description: Create a fraction from a number or from integer numerator and denominator.

name: freqz
description: Calculates the frequency response of a filter given its numerator and denominator coefficients.

name: gamma
description: Compute the gamma function. For small values, the Lanczos approximation is used, and for large values the extended Stirling approximation.

name: gcd
description: Compute the greatest common divisor.

name: getMatrixDataType
description: Find the data type of all elements in a matrix or array, for example "number" if all items are a number and "Complex" if all values are complex numbers. If a matrix contains more than one data type, it will return "mixed".

name: hasNumericValue
description: Test whether a value is an numeric value. In case of a string, true is returned if the string contains a numeric value.

name: hex
description: Format a number as hexadecimal

name: hypot
description: Calculate the hypotenusa of a list with values.

name: identity
description: Returns the identity matrix with size m-by-n. The matrix has ones on the diagonal and zeros elsewhere.

name: ifft
description: Calculate N-dimensional inverse fourier transform

name: im
description: Get the imaginary part of a complex number.

name: index
description: Create an index to get or replace a subset of a matrix

name: intersect
description: Computes the intersection point of lines and/or planes.

name: inv
description: Calculate the inverse of a matrix

name: invmod
description: Calculate the (modular) multiplicative inverse of a modulo b. Solution to the equation ax â‰£ 1 (mod b)

name: isInteger
description: Test whether a value is an integer number.

name: isNaN
description: Test whether a value is NaN (not a number)

name: isNegative
description: Test whether a value is negative: smaller than zero.

name: isNumeric
description: Test whether a value is a numeric value. Returns true when the input is a number, BigNumber, Fraction, or boolean.

name: isPositive
description: Test whether a value is positive: larger than zero.

name: isPrime
description: Test whether a value is prime: has no divisors other than itself and one.

name: isZero
description: Test whether a value is zero.

name: kldivergence
description: Calculate the Kullback-Leibler (KL) divergence  between two distributions.

name: kron
description: Calculates the kronecker product of 2 matrices or vectors.

name: larger
description: Check if value x is larger than y. Returns true if x is larger than y, and false if not.

name: largerEq
description: Check if value x is larger or equal to y. Returns true if x is larger or equal to y, and false if not.

name: lcm
description: Compute the least common multiple.

name: leftShift
description: Bitwise left logical shift of a value x by y number of bits.

name: lgamma
description: Logarithm of the gamma function for real, positive numbers and complex numbers, using Lanczos approximation for numbers and Stirling series for complex numbers.

name: log
description: Compute the logarithm of a value. If no base is provided, the natural logarithm of x is calculated. If base if provided, the logarithm is calculated for the specified base. log(x, base) is defined as log(x) / log(base).

name: log10
description: Compute the 10-base logarithm of a value.

name: log1p
description: Calculate the logarithm of a `value+1`

name: log2
description: Calculate the 2-base of a value. This is the same as calculating `log(x, 2)`.

name: lsolve
description: Finds one solution of the linear system L * x = b where L is an [n x n] lower triangular matrix and b is a [n] column vector.

name: lsolveAll
description: Finds all solutions of the linear system L * x = b where L is an [n x n] lower triangular matrix and b is a [n] column vector.

name: lup
description: Calculate the Matrix LU decomposition with partial pivoting. Matrix A is decomposed in three matrices (L, U, P) where P * A = L * U

name: lusolve
description: Solves the linear system A * x = b where A is an [n x n] matrix and b is a [n] column vector.

name: lyap
description: Solves the Continuous-time Lyapunov equation AP+PA'+Q=0 for P

name: mad
description: Compute the median absolute deviation of a matrix or a list with values. The median absolute deviation is defined as the median of the absolute deviations from the median.

name: map
description: Create a new matrix or array with the results of the callback function executed on each entry of the matrix/array.

name: matrix
description: Create a matrix.

name: matrixFromColumns
description: Create a dense matrix from vectors as individual columns.

name: matrixFromFunction
description: Create a matrix by evaluating a generating function at each index.

name: matrixFromRows
description: Create a dense matrix from vectors as individual rows.

name: max
description: Compute the maximum value of a list of values.

name: mean
description: Compute the arithmetic mean of a list of values.

name: median
description: Compute the median of all values. The values are sorted and the middle value is returned. In case of an even number of values, the average of the two middle values is returned.

name: min
description: Compute the minimum value of a list of values.

name: mod
description: Calculates the modulus, the remainder of an integer division.

name: mode
description: Computes the mode of all values as an array. In case mode being more than one, multiple values are returned in an array.

name: multinomial
description: Multinomial Coefficients compute the number of ways of picking a1, a2, ..., ai unordered outcomes from `n` possibilities. multinomial takes one array of integers as an argument. The following condition must be enforced: every ai > 0.

name: multiply
description: multiply two values.

name: norm
description: Calculate the norm of a number, vector or matrix.

name: not
description: Logical not. Flips the boolean value of given argument.

name: nthRoot
description: Calculate the nth root of a value. The principal nth root of a positive real number A, is the positive real solution of the equation "x^root = A".

name: nthRoots
description: Calculate the nth roots of a value. An nth root of a positive real number A, is a positive real solution of the equation "x^root = A". This function returns an array of complex values.

name: number
description: Create a number or convert a string or boolean into a number.

name: numeric
description: Convert a numeric input to a specific numeric type: number, BigNumber, or Fraction.

name: oct
description: Format a number as octal

name: ones
description: Create a matrix containing ones.

name: or
description: Logical or. Test if at least one value is defined with a nonzero/nonempty value.

name: partitionSelect
description: Partition-based selection of an array or 1D matrix. Will find the kth smallest value, and mutates the input array. Uses Quickselect.

name: permutations
description: Compute the number of permutations of n items taken k at a time

name: pickRandom
description: Pick a random entry from a given array.

name: pinv
description: Calculate the Mooreâ€“Penrose inverse of a matrix

name: polynomialRoot
description: Finds the roots of a univariate polynomial given by its coefficients starting from constant, linear, and so on, increasing in degree.

name: pow
description: Calculates the power of x to y, x^y.

name: print
description: Interpolate values into a string template.
examples: print("The value of pi is $pi", {pi: pi}, 3)

name: prod
description: Compute the product of all values.

name: qr
description: Calculates the Matrix QR decomposition. Matrix `A` is decomposed in two matrices (`Q`, `R`) where `Q` is an orthogonal matrix and `R` is an upper triangular matrix.

name: quantileSeq
description:
Compute the prob order quantile of a matrix or a list with values. The sequence is sorted and the middle value is returned. Supported types of sequence values are: Number, BigNumber, Unit Supported types of probablity are: Number, BigNumber. 

In case of a (multi dimensional) array or matrix, the prob order quantile of all elements will be calculated.

name: random
description: Return a random number.

name: randomInt
description: Return a random integer number

name: range
description: Create a range. Lower bound of the range is included, upper bound is excluded.

name: re
description: Get the real part of a complex number.

name: reshape
description: Reshape a multi dimensional array to fit the specified dimensions.

name: resize
description: Resize a matrix.

name: rightArithShift
description: Bitwise right arithmetic shift of a value x by y number of bits.

name: rightLogShift
description: Bitwise right logical shift of a value x by y number of bits.

name: rotate
description: Returns a 2-D rotation matrix (2x2) for a given angle (in radians). Returns a 2-D rotation matrix (3x3) of a given angle (in radians) around given axis.

name: rotationMatrix
description: Returns a 2-D rotation matrix (2x2) for a given angle (in radians). Returns a 2-D rotation matrix (3x3) of a given angle (in radians) around given axis.

name: round
description: round a value towards the nearest integer.If x is complex, both real and imaginary part are rounded towards the nearest integer. When n is specified, the value is rounded to n decimals.

name: row
description: Return a row from a matrix or array.

name: schur
description: Performs a real Schur decomposition of the real matrix A = UTU'

name: sec
description: Compute the secant of x in radians. Defined as 1/cos(x)

name: sech
description: Compute the hyperbolic secant of x in radians. Defined as 1/cosh(x)

name: setCartesian
description: Create the cartesian product of two (multi)sets. Multi-dimension arrays will be converted to single-dimension arrays and the values will be sorted in ascending order before the operation.

name: setDifference
description: Create the difference of two (multi)sets: every element of set1, that is not the element of set2. Multi-dimension arrays will be converted to single-dimension arrays before the operation.

name: setDistinct
description: Collect the distinct elements of a multiset. A multi-dimension array will be converted to a single-dimension array before the operation.

name: setIntersect
description: Create the intersection of two (multi)sets. Multi-dimension arrays will be converted to single-dimension arrays before the operation.

name: setIsSubset
description: Check whether a (multi)set is a subset of another (multi)set: every element of set1 is the element of set2. Multi-dimension arrays will be converted to single-dimension arrays before the operation.

name: setMultiplicity
description: Count the multiplicity of an element in a multiset. A multi-dimension array will be converted to a single-dimension array before the operation.

name: setPowerset
description: Create the powerset of a (multi)set: the powerset contains very possible subsets of a (multi)set. A multi-dimension array will be converted to a single-dimension array before the operation.

name: setSize
description: Count the number of elements of a (multi)set. When the second parameter "unique" is true, count only the unique values. A multi-dimension array will be converted to a single-dimension array before the operation.

name: setSymDifference
description: Create the symmetric difference of two (multi)sets. Multi-dimension arrays will be converted to single-dimension arrays before the operation.

name: setUnion
description: Create the union of two (multi)sets. Multi-dimension arrays will be converted to single-dimension arrays before the operation.

name: sign
description: Compute the sign of a value. The sign of a value x is 1 when x>1, -1 when x<0, and 0 when x=0.

name: sin
description: Compute the sine of x in radians.

name: sinh
description: Compute the hyperbolic sine of x in radians.

name: size
description: Calculate the size of a matrix.

name: slu
description: Calculate the Matrix LU decomposition with full pivoting. Matrix A is decomposed in two matrices (L, U) and two permutation vectors (pinv, q) where P * A * Q = L * U

name: smaller
description: Check if value x is smaller than value y. Returns true if x is smaller than y, and false if not.

name: smallerEq
description: Check if value x is smaller or equal to value y. Returns true if x is smaller than y, and false if not.

name: solveODE
description: Numerical Integration of Ordinary Differential Equations.

name: sort
description: Sort the items in a matrix. Compare can be a string "asc", "desc", "natural", or a custom sort function.

name: sparse
description: Create a sparse matrix.

name: splitUnit
description: Split a unit in an array of units whose sum is equal to the original unit.

name: sqrt
description: Compute the square root value. If x = y * y, then y is the square root of x.

name: sqrtm
description: Calculate the principal square root of a square matrix. The principal square root matrix `X` of another matrix `A` is such that `X * X = A`.

name: square
description: Compute the square of a value. The square of x is x * x.

name: squeeze
description: Remove inner and outer singleton dimensions from a matrix.

name: std
description: Compute the standard deviation of all values, defined as std(A) = sqrt(variance(A)). Optional parameter normalization can be "unbiased" (default), "uncorrected", or "biased".

name: stirlingS2
description: he Stirling numbers of the second kind, counts the number of ways to partition a set of n labelled objects into k nonempty unlabelled subsets. `stirlingS2` only takes integer arguments. The following condition must be enforced: k <= n. If n = k or k = 1, then s(n,k) = 1.

name: string
description: Create a string or convert a value to a string

name: subset
description: Get or set a subset of the entries of a matrix or characters of a string. Indexes are one-based. There should be one index specification for each dimension of the target. Each specification can be a single index, a list of indices, or a range in colon notation `l:u`. In a range, both the lower bound l and upper bound u are included; and if a bound is omitted it defaults to the most extreme valid value. The cartesian product of the indices specified in each dimension determines the target of the operation.

name: subtract
description: subtract two values.

name: sum
description: Compute the sum of all values.

name: sylvester
description: Solves the real-valued Sylvester equation AX+XB=C for X

name: tan
description: Compute the tangent of x in radians.

name: tanh
description: Compute the hyperbolic tangent of x in radians.

name: to
description: Change the unit of a value.

name: trace
description: Calculate the trace of a matrix: the sum of the elements on the main diagonal of a square matrix.

name: transpose
description: Transpose a matrix

name: typeOf
description: Get the type of a variable.

name: unaryMinus
description: Inverse the sign of a value. Converts booleans and strings to numbers.

name: unaryPlus
description: Converts booleans and strings to numbers.

name: unequal
description: Check unequality of two values. Returns true if the values are unequal, and false if they are equal.

name: unit
description: Create a unit.

name: usolve
description: Finds one solution of the linear system U * x = b where U is an [n x n] upper triangular matrix and b is a [n] column vector.

name: usolveAll
description: Finds all solutions of the linear system U * x = b where U is an [n x n] upper triangular matrix and b is a [n] column vector.

name: variance
description: Compute the variance of all values. Optional parameter normalization can be "unbiased" (default), "uncorrected", or "biased".

name: xgcd
description: Calculate the extended greatest common divisor for two values. The result is an array [d, x, y] with 3 entries, where d is the greatest common divisor, and d = x * a + y * b.

name: xor
description: Logical exclusive or, xor. Test whether one and only one value is defined with a nonzero/nonempty value.

name: zeros
description: Create a matrix containing zeros.

name: zpk2tf
description: Compute the transfer function of a zero-pole-gain model.

name: derivative
description: Takes the derivative of an expression expressed in parser Nodes. The derivative will be taken over the supplied variable in the second parameter. If there are multiple variables in the expression, it will return a partial derivative.

name: evaluate
description: Evaluate an expression or an array with expressions.

name: help
description: Display documentation on a function or data type.

name: leafCount
description: Computes the number of leaves in the parse tree of the given expression

name: rationalize
description: Transform a rationalizable expression in a rational fraction. If rational fraction is one variable polynomial then converts the numerator and denominator in canonical form, with decreasing exponents, returning the coefficients of numerator.

name: resolve
description: Recursively substitute variables in an expression tree.

name: simplify
description: Simplify an expression tree.

name: simplifyConstant
description: Replace constant subexpressions of node with their values.

name: simplifyCore
description: Perform simple one-pass simplifications on an expression tree.

name: symbolicEqual
description: Returns true if the difference of the expressions simplifies to 0
